title_with_small_cards.title: Serverless Consulting Services Benefits
title_with_small_cards.subtitle: Why choose AppsCode as your serverless consulting partner?

service_details.title: Your End-to-End Serverless Consulting Services Partner
service_details.subtitle: Let us build a scalable, cost-effective serverless architecture with minimal operational overheads.

sections.title: Serverless Consulting & Advisory
sections.description: If your organization plans to adopt Serverless architecture, start leveraging our serverless consulting services catered by industry specialists.
offerings: We begin by understanding your needs, use-case and help you design the strategy to achieve your organizational goals faster.
Our serverless consulting experts create a recommended changes report to help you evaluate the benefits before moving ahead in the journey.
With the help of our serverless consulting services, create an actionable development plan that enables you to achieve your business goals in time.

sections.title: Professional Serverless Services
sections.description: We propose the most suitable serverless stack (AWS Lambda, Google Functions, or OSS tools), help you design & implement it with an actionable deployment plan.
offerings: Not able to figure out the right stack and plan to move forward? Get professional serverless experts onboard, helping you find bottlenecks and create the right actionable plan.
Our serverless consultant will give you unbiased opinions based on your current architecture; we do not superimpose anything; instead, we back our statements with experience and best practices.

Our Serverless experts will help eliminate deployment overhead so your team can build and get your solutions to market faster, spending more time on delivering customer value than managing the server.

sections.title: Enabling CI/CD
sections.description: Enabling CI/CD ensures complex serverless applications are developed and delivered faster end-to-end.
offerings: Our serverless consultants will help you implement CI/CD pipelines tailored for serverless applications, ensuring smooth and rapid deployments.
The architects & consultants are well versed in various ways for CI/CD for serverless applications, i.e., AWS SAM pipelines, etcetera.
With best practices from our cloud-native & serverless experts, be confident on operating high-quality cloud apps, ensuring availability, scalability, and early error detection for high availability.

sections.title: Serverless Managed Services
sections.description: Leverage our experience for managing, operating, & optimizing the day-to-day elements of your serverless apps & the entire stack in production, in the most effective way.
offerings: Experience our high-quality observability instrumentation for your serverless application.
We monitor your end-to-end application health state, so it does not impact your business value.
Forget about the hassle of managing CI/CD and monitoring. Let the serverless experts be on your front line.
Our serverless experts will help you get more out of these applications so you can build substantial business value.

sections.title: Serverless Training & Workshops
sections.description: We help you with detailed documentation and build in-house knowledge to monitor system performance and functions for managing your all-new serverless environment like a pro.
offerings: Serverless consultants will assist you in making the necessary cultural changes by implementing best practices.
Build vital knowledge of end-to-end serverless functions from scratch to production and help your team become like experts.
Our in-depth training sessions on serverless function increase your team productivity and avoid knowledge gap issues.

industries.additional_text: Be it an enterprise with datacenters across the world or a rapidly scaling startup, we got it covered!
